mapper.select:
select id,pid,`name`,sort,`type`,icon,url,permission from boot_sys_menu where del_flag = 0
and `name` like concat('%',#{qo.name},'%')
order by sort desc

SELECT boot_sys_menu.url, boot_sys_menu.type, boot_sys_menu.sort, boot_sys_menu.id, boot_sys_menu.pid, boot_sys_menu.name, boot_sys_menu.icon, boot_sys_menu.permission FROM boot_sys_menu ,boot_sys_role ,boot_sys_role_menu WHERE boot_sys_menu.id = boot_sys_role_menu.menu_id AND boot_sys_role_menu.role_id = boot_sys_role.id AND boot_sys_role.id = #{roleId} and boot_sys_menu.del_flag = 0 group by boot_sys_menu.url, boot_sys_menu.type, boot_sys_menu.sort, boot_sys_menu.id, boot_sys_menu.pid, boot_sys_menu.name, boot_sys_menu.icon, boot_sys_menu.permission order by boot_sys_menu.sort desc

SELECT boot_sys_menu.id FROM boot_sys_menu ,boot_sys_role ,boot_sys_role_menu WHERE boot_sys_menu.id = boot_sys_role_menu.menu_id AND boot_sys_role_menu.role_id = boot_sys_role.id AND boot_sys_role.id = #{roleId} and boot_sys_menu.del_flag = 0 group by boot_sys_menu.id
